page.title: 06BALNACRAIG HILL FARM
page.content:
During this time he also has 150 lambing ewes and 30 breeding hoggs to look after. The busiest time in the year is from mid-March until mid-May when he is lambing,calving and ploughing.
Mr.Walker,who works alone,does not use modern machinery because small hill farms do not justify the prices required.The{disadvantage}of ploughing on a hill farm is that you can{only plough{downhill.}He buys second hand equipment but even then it can be expensive.
Mr. Walker uses a{crop rotation}of four years grass/barley or oats/ barley or oats/then back to grass.
